QuestData.Title: Kill 'em With Sleep Deprivation
QuestData.Description: It's a little known fact that dwarves, particularly of the Dark Iron variety, need rest! Lots of rest!$B$BNow I ask you; How can they sleep without pillows? Exactly, $n, they can't. This is why you must steal their pillows.$b$bOnce you've finished your cushion-thievery, talk with Taskmaster Scrange. He's a bit deeper in the cave, working on a covert project with Hansel.
QuestData.RewardText: I see Evonice is up to her old tricks again. I guess I'll just... um... hang onto these pillows for a while.$b$bThe important part is that you're here. We're going to need your help.
